content:
In Kherson, as a result of Russian shelling, the objects of critical infrastructure, the museum, the center of creativity and cars were damaged last day.

About thisreportedKherson Ova Chairman Alexander Proudin.

Also recorded in the port infrastructure and the park area were recorded.

Last day, the enemy also fired at the settlements of the region: Golden Beam, Sadovo, Chernobayivka, Belozerka, Mikhailivka, Obradokamanka, Tyaginka, Berislav, Tomin Balka, Antonovka, Prydniprovsko Lviv.

The military kissed the residential quarters of the settlements of the region, in particular, 10 high -rise buildings and 11 private homes were damaged.

As a result of hostile attacks, the settlements of the region were hit in the gas pipeline, a point of indomitability and a garage, as well as the airport.

Due to Russian aggression, two people were injured.

As reported by the Armyinform, on Wednesday night, March 6, Russiansstruck the rocket strokein the city of Pokrovsk in Donetsk region.
title: In Kherson, due to the shelling of the Russian Federation, there is a hit in the port infrastructure, the museum is damaged
description: This was reported by the head of the Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin. They were also fixed ...
author: Army Inform
